lead_paragraph: Brian Gay, seeking his first PGA Tour victory, shot a seven-under 64 yesterday for a two-shot lead over Mark Calcavecchia at the Chrysler Championship in Palm Harbor, Fla. Gay had little problem with his putting, making three of his birdies from at least 20 feet.
